description: Cisco Systems is well positioned to capitalize on the opportunity in artificial intelligence (AI) to revive sales growth. That’s according to its chair and CEO, Chuck Robbins, in a statement following the release of the company’s first-quarter results for fiscal 2025. “Cisco is off to a strong start to fiscal 2025,” he said. “Our customers […]
title: Cisco Reports 4th Consecutive Revenue Decline, Looks to AI for Growth Revival
